mapnav.arianavbar: vertical button group for map navigation

attribution.defaultnrcan: Â© His Majesty the King in Right of Canada, as represented by the Minister of Natural Resources

mapctrl.crosshair: Use Arrows, + and - keys to navigate the map, Enter to select and Shift+Arrow Up or Down to modify the pan value.

layers.removeLayerDescription: To remove a layer, click on the delete icon to the right of the layer. To revert to back to view functionality click on the delete button at the top.
layers.sortingDescription:
To sort the layers you can simply drag and drop each layer panel.

Using the keyboard for drag and drop

If you using the keyboard for sorting layers, note the following;

  • When the layer panel has focus use the spacebar to lift the panel. This will start the drag.
  • Once the drag has started you can use the up and down arrows to move the panel
  • You can use the spacebar to drop the panel.
  • Use the ESC key to cancel drag
layers.completeTable: For complete data, please check data table tabs.

details.selectVisbleLayer: Click on a feature on the map to view it's details

focusdialog.title: Keyboard Navigation
focusdialog.main: If enable, we will keep focus locked on the viewer. To exit, press CTRL + Q

layer.loadfailed: Layer [__param__] failed to load on map __param__.
layer.notfound: The sublayer __param__ of the GeoView layer __param__ does not exist on the server
layer.createtwice: Can not execute twice the createGeoViewRasterLayers method for the map __param__
layer.usedtwice: Duplicate use of geoview layer identifier [__param__] on map __param__

schema.notFound: A schema error was found, check the console to see what is wrong.

validation.changeDisplayLanguageLayers: Layers can not be relaoded because the configuration does not support this language

geoChart.noChartAvailable: Click on the map layer with chart
